name: July Gem Journey Set
description: So excited for our next class in July—we’re going to Laurasia! Where is Laurasia, you ask? Laurasia was an ancient supercontinent, a land of mystery and primordial power that once encompassed North America, Europe, and Asia in a single, unified continent.

name: Nectar Perfume & Intention Candle Set
description: This offering honors the hummingbird animal spirit — a symbol of joy, wonder, and lightness of being. This tiny yet mighty bird brings a message of fierce independence and endurance.

name: Mother Perfume & Intention Candle Duo
description: Our hope is that this scent will bring you closer to your mother or other maternal figures in your life. Work with this duo to celebrate the matriarchs who made you who you are and embody their strong yet soothing feminine energy.
openNotes: ["our hope is that this scent will bring you closer to your mother or other maternal figures in your life. work with this duo to celebrate the matriarchs who made you who you are", "embody their strong yet soothing feminine energy."]

name: Amatus Perfume
description: Whether you wish to manifest love in your romantic relationships, friendships, or even with yourself, this Medium Tumbled Rose Quartz is your offering. Rose quartz is the Mother of all love stones and one of my favorites for heart healing and all kinds of love....

name: Frida Perfume
description: Ametrine embodies the boundary where amethyst and citrine meet — a perfect harmony of inspiration and confident action. It combines amethyst’s peaceful and balancing vibrations with citrine’s energies of empowerment and abundance.

name: Selva Perfume Set with Porcelain Jasper Sphere
description: The perfume and tea lights in this set were both handcrafted using a replica of the blend made for me during my trip to the Yucatan Peninsula. We’ve also included a porcelain jasper sphere, which comes from the Yucatan region of Mexico — the place that inspired Selva.

name: Essence of Africa Perfume
description: Journey to Africa and experience divine illumination, empowerment, and rejuvenation with our Essence of Africa Perfume.  It’s a restorative blend of tea tree, Egyptian geranium, acacia absolute, watermelon, birch tar, chamomile, cape chamomile, and frankincense.

name: Zeus Perfume
description: Honor your power and wisdom with our Zeus Perfume. Inspired by the king of the gods, we handcrafted this blend right here at Sage Goddess Headquarters. It transforms you as you wear it, encouraging you to take action.

name: Limited Edition Quintessence Perfume
description: In ancient alchemy, quintessence was the essence of all matter, all creation, and all manifestation. Quintessence is the substance of the stars and our souls. Incorporate this offering into your daily self-care rituals to transmute low vibrations and raise your level of consciousness.

name: Take My Breath Away Perfume
description: This handcrafted blend lives up to its name with a clean scent like a breath of fresh air. Additionally, it’s packaged in a convenient amber-colored dropper bottle for all your aromatherapy needs.

name: Christmas Peace Perfume
description: Anointing yourself this holiday season will help you stay grounded, peaceful, and calm during one of the most magical yet stressful times for so many. Our Christmas Peace Perfume was handcrafted here at SG with notes of: Fir, lavender, and peppermint.

name: Christmas Tree Perfume Trio
description: If you love the smell of the forest and want to tap into its magic, this set is for you! This set includes Spruce Perfume for calm, Fir Perfume for clarity, and Pine Perfume for wellness.

name: Vesica Piscis Perfume
description: We designed this blend to transport your consciousness to that cosmic womb, where complementary forces converge to create something transformative. Handcrafted here at SG Headquarters, this subtly sweet potion contains notes to support you as you birth your own inspired creations into the world.

name: Song of Ishtar Perfume
description: Honor the potent and transformative essence of the great Mesopotamian goddess of love, war, and unyielding strength with our Song of Ishtar Perfume. This blend is an invocation of her power and beauty, weaving together sacred notes to embody her multifaceted divinity.

name: Violet Perfume
description: Made with violet from all over the world and infused with a touch of wood musk, Violet Perfume is decadent, enchanting, and filled with ancient wisdom. It evokes Venusian energies of sensitivity and love and is a powerful blend for channeling abundance and tranquility.

name: August 2023 Living Essence Mist
description: This mist is handcrafted right here at SG. It’s the ULTIMATE blend for supporting a life, space, and practice filled with embodiment and grounding. The carrier of this blend is a luxurious gemstone-infused hydrosol blend of of mitti attar, vetiver, and tuberose.

name: Calavera Perfume
description: This perfume was custom-made right here at Sage Goddess Headquarters, with oils specifically chosen to honor Día de los Muertos, including: Cuban tobacco, white cedar, tea leaf, frankincense, and brown sugar.

name: Seance Perfume
description: Close your eyes for a moment. What do you sense? When your whole world is shrouded in darkness, what sorts of feelings and visions come to life? Our handcrafted Seance Perfume is a portal to the unknown — a reminder of the magic and mystery that exists beyond our world of time and space.

name: Belisama Perfume
description: Belisama is a goddess of fire, bridging the power and light of the Sun and Moon. ‘Belisama’ means ‘the brightest one’ or ‘most mighty one and her energy embodies fiery, powerful vibrations. Anoint with this blend to light up the night, tap into your sensuality, and have some fun!

name: Medicine Bag with Gemstone & Perfume Sample Set
description: This offering comes with three crystals and three sample-size handcrafted SG perfumes. Each of the crystals corresponds to one of the perfumes. It also comes with a pink faux leather drawstring medicine bag to easily carry your crystals and perfumes with you on the go!

name: Crowns of Success Condition Oil
description: Shine at your brightest wattage with our Crowns of Success Condition Oil. This custom blend is a confidence-boosting oil we designed to bring out the goddess within you.

name: Insight Perfume & Incense Duo
description: This duo invokes the wisdom and intuition of The High Priestess in the tarot. Work with this offering to expand your awareness and tap into your innermost magic.

name: Helios kai Selene Perfume Duo
description: This new perfume pairing invokes the Sun god Helios and the Moon goddess Selene, combining solar and lunar energies. Anoint with this offering to bask in sunshine and bathe in moonlight.

name: Back Off Betty Mini Perfume Mist
description: This mist is here to help navigate even the most challenging energies. We handcrafted this perfume mist right here at SG. It features the same blend as my customer-favorite Back Off Betty Perfume in a base of distilled water.

name: Cerridwen Perfume
description: Summer is just around the corner, and our Cerridwen Perfume is the perfect companion for the season. Anoint yourself with this blend to make this summer the summer of your dreams.

name: Song of Astraeus Perfume
description: Kambaba jasper is the Divine Masculine in stone form. It invokes and enhances all masculine qualities, including assertiveness, action, independence, adventure, logic, and protection. Work with this offering as a reminder of the strength and wisdom that lie within.

name: Mint Mocha Perfume
description: This perfume is an invigorating delight featuring notes of mint, coffee, and chocolate. It’s a delectable, rejuvenating potion guaranteed to break up any stagnant energies and kick your rituals into high gear!
openNotes: ["this perfume is an invigorating delight featuring notes of mint", "coffee", "chocolate. it\u2019s a delectable", "rejuvenating potion guaranteed to break up any stagnant energies", "kick your rituals into high gear!"]

name: Limited Edition Song of Astraeus Perfume
description: This handcrafted blend calls forth the energy of Astraeus — the Greek Titan god of the stars, astrology, planets, dusk, and winds. It’s a beautiful reminder that even in the darkest times, the shimmering radiance of the stars lies within, waiting to shine out into the world.

name: Dieta Perfume
description: This perfume was designed to help you connect to the energy of spiritual preparation ahead of any sacred shamanic journey or spiritual process. It was handcrafted here at SG with notes of pink lotus, frankincense, myrrh, sandalwood, black agarwood, Balm of Gilead, and amyris.

name: Palma Perfume
description: This palmistry-inspired fragrance is blended with notes of rhododendron, basil, myrrh, lemon, musk, and patchouli. This earthy and uplifting blend will support your spiritual growth while keeping you centered and grounded.
openNotes: ["this palmistry-inspired fragrance is blended with notes of rhododendron", "basil", "myrrh", "lemon", "musk", "patchouli. this earthy", "uplifting blend will support your spiritual growth while keeping you centered", "grounded."]

name: December 2023 Living Essence Mist
description: This mist the ultimate blend for slowing down and taking a moment to relax and reflect. The process of creating this mist was months in the making. We formulated it to be long-lasting so that anything it touches will hold the scent for days.

name: Lilith Unbound & Eve Unbound Perfume Duo
description: This offering includes two perfumes that channel the wisdom and feminine empowerment of two female archetypes: Lilith and Eve. Lilith and Eve are both figures from Judeo-Christian mythology that embody independence, and the importance of setting boundaries in love.

name: Athena’s 111 Perfume
description: Harness the energy of 111 to boost your manifestation power with this blend containing notes of sandalwood, patchouli, bay, labdanum, five finger grass, myrrh, manuka honey, ginger, St. John’s wort, and neroli.
